name: Ilmu Spesial
description:
Robertosaurs is known for his Quirky Art, Tampering straight lines but equiped with strong words. 
Working on SLOOPY Studio and gain high respect from many brands such Steeze.ltd, Berak, Casual Fan Club and Familias from hist past works. Few to mention graphic art collaboration for music like SKANDAL, B.U.K.T.U and Wil$on using Robert graphic. Robert also use Music to drop the messages, and play hist part as Illustrator and Art Director on his own SLOOPY Studio.

Artwork Info

Artist : Robertosaurs
Project Name : Ilmu Spesial 
Year : 2021


Each NFT has underlying physical real trading cards.
Everytime you buy this NFT you’ll also get Numbered Printed Version of each Artworks.
Pop Haul is an Event and Store located in Indonesia.
